hero.name: Prasanth
hero.about: Game developer and software engineer dedicated to building interactive worlds and impactful digital solutions.

about_me.description: I hold a Bachelor of Science (Honors) degree in Software Engineering from the University of Kelaniya, graduating with First Class Honors. With over five years of hands-on industry experience, I bring a dynamic, results-driven mindset to every task I undertake, supported by a strong technical foundation and proven leadership skills. I thrive in environments that challenge me to grow both academically and professionally, and I am deeply committed to research, innovation, and knowledge sharing.

academic.description: I complete my undergraduate studies with First Class Honors, where I gain strong theoretical and practical knowledge. During my time at university, I actively participated in leadership and organizational roles, including serving on the Organizing Committee of AIESEC. As part of my final year research, I developed a machine learning model to predict and provide a quantitative score for COVID-19 severity using chest X-rays and CT images, contributing to early diagnosis and decision-making support during the pandemic. My academic journey laid the foundation for my career in game and software development.

I complete my primary and secondary education at Ng/Wijayaratnam Hindu Central College, where I actively participate in leadership roles as a school prefect and secretary of the A/L Union. I sit for the G.C.E. Ordinary Level (O/L) examination in 2012 with a strong academic performance. I then pursue the Physical Science stream for my Advanced Level (A/L) studies and obtain 3 B grades in Combined Mathematics, Physics, and Chemistry in 2015. This academic foundation earns me the opportunity to gain admission to the University of Kelaniya for a B.Sc. (Honors) degree in Software Engineering.

work_experience.role: Chief Executive Officer | Senior Software Engineer - Game Development
work_experience.description: I lead a passionate team dedicated to delivering high-quality digital experiences with a strong focus on game development, web/mobile applications, and interactive solutions. While I oversee business strategy, client relations, and operational leadership, I also remain deeply involved in the technical side as a Senior Software Engineer – Game Development. I architect and develop end-to-end game solutions using Unity 3D and PixiJS, creating engaging, scalable, and cross-platform games. I integrate features such as REST APIs, in-game advertisements, in-app purchases, and Firebase-based services, and ensure successful deployment to the Play Store and App Store. I also drive the company’s innovation efforts, exploring AI applications in games and interactive technologies. Additionally, I design and build responsive web applications using ReactJS and cross-platform mobile apps with Flutter, ensuring seamless user experiences across devices.Under my leadership, Techserw has successfully delivered projects for both local and international clients, combining technical excellence with a deep understanding of user engagement, storytelling, and product-market fit. I am committed to mentoring developers, growing the studio’s capabilities, and building a global presence for Sri Lankan talent in the game development industry.

company.name: University of Sri Jayewardenepura Sri lanka

work_experience.description: As a Visiting Lecturer for Level 3 students in the Game Designing and Development module, I deliver comprehensive lectures and hands-on sessions covering key areas of game development, including game mechanics, storytelling, level design, prototyping, and Unity-based implementation. My role focuses on blending theoretical knowledge with industry-relevant practices to equip students with the skills needed to excel in game development. I also mentor students on their project work, fostering creativity, critical thinking, and collaboration in a studio-like learning environment.

I lead a game development team at Arimac Lanka, Sri Lanka’s premier digital solutions provider. With over 4 years of hands-on experience in mobile game development, I design and build complete game solutions from concept to deployment. My core expertise lies in using Unity 3D and PixiJS to develop engaging, cross-platform games.I implement advanced features such as REST API integrations, in-game advertisements, in-app purchases, push notifications, and real-time analytics using Firebase. I manage the full deployment lifecycle across both the Play Store and App Store.Beyond game development, I contribute to projects built in Flutter and ReactJS whenever the team requires, maintaining flexibility and cross-functional collaboration. My role also involves mentoring junior developers, conducting code reviews, and ensuring high-quality, scalable code delivery within agile workflows.

I teach the Game Development Technology module for Level 3 students, focusing on core concepts such as game architecture, interactive mechanics, graphics programming, and real-time deployment. I conduct both lectures and hands-on sessions using industry-standard tools like Unity, guiding students through real-world development workflows. I also mentor students in building playable prototypes and portfolio-quality projects, fostering creativity, technical skills, and collaborative thinking.

I begin my career as a Game Development Intern at Arimac Lanka, Sri Lanka's leading provider of digital solutions specializing in Game Design and Development, AI/ML, Mobile and Enterprise Solutions, and Immersive Technologies. During this internship, I work primarily with Unity 3D and PixiJS to build interactive gameplay features and user experiences. I also gain hands-on experience integrating Firebase for backend services and deploying applications to both the Play Store and App Store. This role helps me build a strong foundation in game development, version control, and cross-platform deployment, while immersing me in a fast-paced, professional development environment that shapes my technical discipline and creative thinking.

work_experience.role: Freelancing Web application, Mobile application and Game development
work_experience.description: I work as a freelance developer specializing in web applications, mobile applications, and game development. I collaborate with clients to design and build user-centric solutions using modern technologies such as AngularJS, Flutter, Springboot and Unity. My responsibilities include full-cycle development, from requirement gathering and design to coding, testing, and deployment. Through freelancing, I continue to sharpen my technical skills, adapt to diverse project needs, and deliver high-quality digital experiences.

I work as a Life & Health Insurance Agent, helping clients understand and choose the right insurance solutions for their needs. This role strengthens my communication, negotiation, and interpersonal skills—crucial for client interactions and collaboration in my current tech career. It also sharpens my ability to explain complex information clearly, build trust, and manage time effectively. These experiences have helped me approach game development and software engineering with a user-first mindset, empathy, and a strong sense of responsibility.

I work as a Machine Operator, managing and maintaining production machinery with a strong focus on precision, efficiency, and safety. This experience has taught me the value of discipline, attention to detail, and the importance of process optimization—skills that continue to support my work in software and game development. Working in a high-pressure, fast-paced environment helped me develop a strong work ethic, problem-solving mindset, and a deep appreciation for teamwork and reliability, all of which I carry into my tech career today.I work as a Machine Operator, managing and maintaining production machinery with a strong focus on precision, efficiency, and safety. This experience has taught me the value of discipline, attention to detail, and the importance of process optimization—skills that continue to support my work in software and game development. Working in a high-pressure, fast-paced environment helped me develop a strong work ethic, problem-solving mindset, and a deep appreciation for teamwork and reliability, all of which I carry into my tech career today.

projects_overview.title: The Lab of My Builds
projects_overview.description: Dive into the diverse projects I’ve brought to life from concept to deployment, showcasing my skills, creativity, and dedication that reflect my growth as a developer and my commitment to delivering impact.

list.title: Dialog Super Cricket
list.tag_line: Telco Game for Dialog Axiata PLC
list.description: Dialog Super Cricket is an exciting, fast-paced mobile cricket game that brings the thrill of the pitch to players’ fingertips. Developed with Unity, this game combines smooth gameplay, responsive controls, and vibrant graphics to deliver an immersive cricket experience. Players can bat, bowl, and compete in quick matches, aiming for high scores and big wins.

list.title: TechieSays Junior
list.description: TechieSays Junior is an engaging educational game designed to introduce young learners to the fundamentals of technology through interactive play. Built with a focus on kids, it combines fun mini-games, quizzes, and guided lessons to help children develop logical thinking and digital literacy skills in a safe and entertaining environment. The game features vibrant visuals, child-friendly navigation, and rewarding challenges that keep young minds curious and motivated. Parents and educators can track progress, making TechieSays Junior a trusted companion for early tech education.

list.title: SLT Kimaki
list.tag_line: Telco Game for Sri Lankan Telecom PLC
list.description: I developed this interactive game for the SLT, built with Unity. The game provides users with an engaging, gamified experience to enhance brand interaction and user retention. My role covered the full cycle from prototyping game mechanics to implementation, and optimization for performance on Android and IOS devices.

list.title: OMI Card Game
list.tag_line: Sri Lanka's Traditional Casual Card Game
list.description: OMI Game is a modern digital adaptation of the beloved Sri Lankan card game Omi, bringing friends and families together for endless rounds of strategy and fun. Designed with an intuitive interface and smooth gameplay, this version stays true to the classic rules while adding user-friendly features that make playing online as engaging as playing around a table. Whether you’re a seasoned Omi player or new to the game, you can enjoy quick matches, multiplayer mode, and a vibrant community that celebrates this cultural favourite.

list.title: Typing Titans
list.tag_line: Defeat with Words. Win with Skill.
list.description: Typing Titans is an engaging browser-based action game designed to help kids improve their typing skills in a fun and adventurous way. Set in an enchanting forest, players battle playful enemy creatures by typing the letters or words that appear above them, turning learning into an exciting quest. With colorful visuals and kid-friendly gameplay, Typing Titans transforms typing practice into an immersive gaming experience.
features: Runs smoothly in any modern web browsers

list.title: The Legend Saradiel
list.description: The Legend Saradiel is a captivating browser-based action game built with PixiJS, bringing to life the folklore of Sri Lanka’s legendary outlaw hero, Saradiel. Players step into the role of Saradiel, navigating lush forest environments and colonial landscapes while battling enemies, collecting coins, and avoiding obstacles. The game combines classic side-scrolling mechanics with vibrant 2D graphics and intuitive controls, making it accessible and fun for all ages. Designed to be lightweight and easily playable on any modern browser, The Legend Saradiel offers an engaging way to connect with local history through fast-paced gameplay and educational storytelling.
features: Runs smoothly in any modern web browsers

list.title: Candy Escape
list.description: Candy Escape is a fun, fast-paced browser game developed with PixiJS where players dive into a colorful candy world filled with obstacles and treats. Navigate your character through an endless sugary maze, dodging candy monsters and barriers while collecting bonuses to boost your score. With its vibrant visuals, intuitive controls, and addictive arcade-style gameplay, Candy Escape is designed to deliver bite-sized entertainment right from your browser — perfect for kids and casual players alike!
features: Runs smoothly in any modern web browsers

list.title: Crappy Puppy
list.description: Crappy Puppy is a quirky, lighthearted browser game built with PixiJS where players help an adorable but mischievous puppy navigate through tricky obstacles. With simple controls and endless scrolling mechanics, the goal is to dodge obstacles and survive as long as possible while racking up points. Its cartoonish visuals, catchy vibe, and pick-up-and-play nature make Crappy Puppy a fun time-killer for players of all ages, playable instantly on any device.
features: Runs smoothly in any modern web browsers

list.title: Turbo Snake
list.description: Turbo Snake is a fast-paced browser game developed with PixiJS that puts a modern twist on the classic snake gameplay. Players control a colorful, turbo-charged snake that must gobble up food while avoiding obstacles. With smooth animations, responsive controls, and an addictive loop of speed and strategy, Turbo Snake delivers bite-sized fun that players can enjoy anywhere, anytime, on any device.
features: Runs smoothly in any modern web browsers

list.title: Pug's Pen
list.description: Pug’s Pen is a sweet and engaging match-3 puzzle game built with PixiJS, starring an adorable pug! Players swap and match colorful treats to clear levels, earn points, and keep the pug happy and playful. With its vibrant visuals, rewarding combos, and cheerful theme, Pug’s Pen offers a relaxing yet addictive experience for puzzle lovers of all ages.
features: Runs smoothly in any modern web browsers

list.title: Ostrich Run
list.tag_line: Dash, dodge, and outrun the wild!
list.description: Ostrich Run is a fast-paced endless runner game built with PixiJS, where you guide a quirky ostrich through a lively environment full of obstacles and surprises. Players must react quickly to dodge hurdles, collect power-ups, and see how far they can run before the wild catches up! Bright visuals, smooth animations, and simple yet engaging mechanics make Ostrich Run a fun adventure for players seeking a casual yet thrilling challenge.
features: Runs smoothly in any modern web browsers

list.title: Hunter
list.tag_line: Aim true. Hunt fast. Survive the wild.
list.description: Hunter is an action-packed game developed using PixiJS, where players take on the role of a skilled hunter in a vibrant wilderness. The goal is to attack, aim and shoot at moving opponents and staying alert for sudden threats. With its quick reflex gameplay, charming 2D visuals, and satisfying shooting mechanics, Hunter delivers an exciting test of precision and timing for casual gamers and action fans alike.
features: Runs smoothly in any modern web browsers

list.title: Hunter 3
list.tag_line: Stay sharp. Strike fast. Master the hunt.
list.description: This game challenges players to test their reflexes and accuracy in a dynamic wild setting filled with multiple moving targets and sudden obstacles. With faster gameplay, crisp 2D graphics, and improved mechanics, Hunter 3 keeps players on the edge of their seat as they aim to rack up high scores and prove their hunting prowess.
features: Runs smoothly in any modern web browsers

list.title: Light
list.description: Light is a simple yet addictive arcade game built with PixiJS. A central circle rotates with a pointer, and players must time their taps perfectly to shoot the circle outward and attach it to the rotating ring of other circles. It’s all about precision, timing, and rhythm — making it a fun and challenging experience for players of all ages.
features: Runs smoothly in any modern web browsers

list.title: Tikiri
list.description: Tikiri is a reflex-based arcade game built with PixiJS that tests your timing and coordination. Players control a circle with two attached squares that continuously rotate at the bottom of the screen. As different patterns of rectangles descend from above, you must spin the circle to maneuver the squares through gaps and avoid collisions. Simple to play yet challenging to master, Tikiri keeps you hooked with its dynamic patterns and addictive dodge-and-rotate gameplay.
features: Runs smoothly in any modern web browsers

list.title: Dodgy Devil
list.tag_line: Dodge, Dash, and Outsmart the Onslaught!
list.description: Dodgy Devil is a fast-paced arcade dodging game built with PixiJS where quick reflexes are your best defense. Take control of your mischievous devil character and slide left or right to evade an endless stream of obstacles descending from above. With simple controls and increasingly challenging patterns, Dodgy Devil keeps you on your toes as you aim for your longest survival streak yet!
features: Runs smoothly in any modern web browsers

list.title: Space Boogie
list.description: Space Boogie is a fun, hyper-casual dodging game built with PixiJS. Take control of your spaceship and boogie through the galaxy, skillfully avoiding incoming asteroids and cosmic obstacles. With simple one-touch controls and an endless space to explore, this game challenges your reflexes and keeps you grooving as you aim for the highest score in the stars.
features: Runs smoothly in any modern web browsers

list.title: Jaffna Boy
list.description: Jaffna Boy is a fun and simple skill game built with PixiJS, inspired by local Sri Lankan village life. Play as a cheerful boy standing with a spoon, ready to catch delicious food falling from above. Tap at just the right moment to aim and catch each treat. It’s all about timing, precision, and a bit of island flavor — perfect for quick, casual play!
features: Runs smoothly in any modern web browsers

list.title: Upside Down
list.description: Upside Down is a fast-paced endless runner where you guide two quirky birds — one short and one tall, in bright green and blue — along a gravity-flipping path. Tap to switch your birds between the top and bottom lanes to dodge incoming obstacles. With quick reflexes and simple mechanics, this PixiJS game puts your focus and timing to the test in a colorful, gravity-defying adventure!
features: Runs smoothly in any modern web browsers

list.title: Vivo Little V
list.description: Vivo Little V is a vibrant reskin of the classic Hunter 3, giving the beloved arrow-shooting gameplay a playful new style. Step into a colorful forest adventure where you tap to aim and fire arrows at moving targets, testing your precision and timing skills. With its refreshed visuals and the same addictive mechanics, this PixiJS game keeps players hooked, one shot at a time!
features: Runs smoothly in any modern web browsers

list.title: Kasikili Bergmann Roulette
list.tag_line: Spin the Wheel, Test Your Luck!
list.description: Kasikili Bergmann Roulette is a simple yet captivating PixiJS mini-game inspired by the timeless game of chance — but with a unique twist. The entire game theme is thoughtfully designed to reflect the style of traditional African roulette machines and the cultural vibrance surrounding them. Players spin the wheel, place their bets, and watch the ball settle while enjoying visuals and sounds that celebrate African heritage. With its fast-paced, tap-to-play mechanics, it’s perfect for quick rounds of casual fun — anytime, anywhere.

client.review: Working with Techserw, particularly Rama, Prasanth, and Pradeepa, has been an absolute pleasure. Their dedication to excellence shines through in every aspect of our collaboration. The team's communication, led by Prasanth, is unparalleled - clear, prompt, and always accommodating. Rama and Pradeepa were always patient and understanding, providing good alternatives to better my app. Their responsiveness is remarkable, ensuring any queries or concerns are addressed swiftly. Their overall approach to working together is nothing short of exceptional, delivering a stunning app that exceeds expectations. I have no hesitation in recommending their services to anyone seeking top-notch solutions. Keep up the fantastic work, Techserw!

list.title: Sri Lanka Parliament Election (2020) Broadcasting System
list.description: Designed and developed a real-time broadcasting system for a major Sri Lankan TV channel to present the 2020 Parliamentary Election results.Built with Unity, the system processed incoming vote counts and displayed dynamic visual graphics, including seat allocations, winning parties, and trends.The platform supported high-pressure live broadcasts with seamless updates, ensuring viewers received accurate, engaging election coverage as results unfolded.This project highlights my capability to engineer reliable broadcast solutions that handle live data and deliver mission-critical information to large audiences.
features: Real-time seat allocation and Party comparison visuals
On-brand graphics optimized for TV screens
Clear, engaging election coverage trusted by millions

list.title: Sri Lanka Presidential Election (2019) Broadcasting System
list.description: Developed a robust real-time election broadcasting system for a leading Sri Lankan TV channel during the 2019 Presidential Election.The solution was built using Unity to display live election results, vote counts, and winner predictions in visually engaging formats.The system handled large-scale data integration, real-time updates, and broadcast-ready graphics to ensure accurate and dynamic on-air presentation throughout the election night.This project showcased my ability to create high-performance, mission-critical broadcast applications under tight timelines and national visibility.
features: Dynamic on-air graphics for live TV broadcasting
Live data feeds for instant updates
Accuracy and reliability during high-pressure election coverage

list.title: Keells Millionaire – Customer Reward Slot Machine
list.description: Keells Millionaire is a digital reward platform I developed for Keells Supermarket’s annual gift program. Shoppers who make qualifying purchases receive an SMS with a unique link to an online slot machine. By spinning the slot, customers stand a chance to instantly win exciting prizes, including cash rewards up to LKR 1 million. The system drives customer loyalty and repeat purchases through an engaging, gamified experience.
features: Real-time prize allocation and winner tracking.
Secure transaction management for cash prize distribution.
Annual scalability for thousands of participants.

list.title: Eelam Maangalyam
list.description: Eelam Maangalyam is a dedicated matchmaking platform designed to help the Tamil community find compatible life partners. The platform brings together modern technology and cultural values, offering a trusted space for individuals and families to connect meaningfully.

list.title: Tour Cost Estimator
list.tag_line: Effortless Distance & Cost Calculation for Every Journey
list.description: I developed this solution for a travel tech company to simplify tour planning by integrating Google Maps. The tool calculates the total distance and estimated travel time between multiple destinations and automatically computes a detailed tour fee based on customized pricing rules. This streamlines itinerary planning for travel agents and provides travelers with accurate, transparent cost estimates.
features: Integrated Google Map with Directions API

list.title: Sri Lanka Driver Guide
list.description: I developed a user-friendly mobile application for a travel tech company, designed specifically for their registered drivers. The app enables drivers to easily browse and find new tour opportunities, apply for available trips, and manage their bookings seamlessly. This solution streamlines the connection between drivers and tourists, ensuring smooth operations and an enhanced travel experience for everyone involved.

list.title: IMI Games
list.description: I contributed to the development and maintenance of a hyper-casual games portal mobile app, focusing on bug fixes, new feature implementation, and overall performance enhancements. The app allows users to explore and play from a diverse collection of hundreds of mini-games, offering seamless access to their favorite hyper-casual gaming experiences in one place.

list.title: OKE
list.description: I developed a web-based administrative dashboard for OKE Supermarket, enabling the management team to efficiently handle products, track customer orders, manage customer profiles, and gain valuable business insights. The dashboard provides real-time data visualization, inventory control, and intuitive tools that simplify daily operations and support data-driven decision-making

list.title: Sri Lanka Driver Guide
list.tag_line: Digital Control Tower for Smarter Tours
list.description: It centralizes the management of customer inquiries, tour bookings, driver profiles, driver availability, payments, and performance metrics like leaderboards.  With this solution, the team can seamlessly track and assign drivers, monitor tour statuses, and manage payments — all while ensuring data accuracy and faster decision-making. It empowers the Digital Tourism team to deliver exceptional travel experiences with streamlined back-office operations.

soft_skills.description: Beyond my technical expertise, I believe strong soft skills are essential to grow, lead, and collaborate effectively. My ability to adapt, communicate clearly, and solve problems creatively has helped me navigate diverse roles in both academia and industry. I strive to cultivate a growth mindset, empathy, and leadership qualities that add value to every team and project I am part of.

reviews.review: I highly recommend Prasanth Sivakumar as an exceptional Software Engineer. During our collaboration, Prasanth consistently demonstrated his ability to tackle complex problems with effective solutions. He is a remarkable team player, always contributing positively and learning new technologies at an impressive pace. Furthermore, Prasanth's strong focus on time management and commitment to deadlines makes him an incredibly reliable and valuable asset to any team.
He delivers good result. I will hire him again.
Siva has delivered high-quality work, followed up throughout the process, and met all deadlines. He provides clear guidance and offers great solutions. Highly recommended!

I've had the pleasure of working with Prasanth Sivakumar during our freelancing days, and I can't recommend him highly enough. As developer, Prasanth brought an unmatched level of dedication and expertise to every project we tackled. Prasanth’s ability to manage projects was nothing short of impressive. He has a unique talent for breaking down complex tasks and ensuring every team member understands their role, leading to efficient and successful project completions. His contributions consistently exceeded expectations, showcasing his deep technical knowledge and creative problem-solving skills.What sets Prasanth apart is his passion for gaming development. He doesn’t just see it as a job but as a craft he is continually honing. His innovative ideas and attention to detail have resulted in some of the most engaging and immersive gaming experiences I've seen.Moreover, Prasanth is a fantastic team player. He’s always ready to lend a hand, share his knowledge, and go the extra mile to ensure the success of the project. His positive attitude and commitment to excellence make him an invaluable asset to any team.
I would absolutely work with Siva again. I am very happy with my website, he did an amazing job!

Prasanth was a fantastic person to work with and is not only a multi-skilled and insightful colleague. He gives his 100% effort to any working part of the project, he can manage a team with very strong problem-solving skills and he is a great person to any software company.
Prasanth is a hard working individual, who can solve any kind of problems. he was my senior, during those period he taught me a lot. i will definitely recommend him for any entity.

I had worked with Prashanth sivakumar directly in some projects. He is multi-skilled person able to do any sort of work in IT. His skill was not restricted within particular domain. He was good at game development able to see from his profile and i have directly worked with him. Great employee with very strong problem solving skills. Prasanth is an asset to any company.

I've seen Prasanth go above and beyond in web developing and gaming. I rarely come across real talents who stand out like Prasanth. I had the pleasure of working with him for three years at the university, collaborating on several project teams.

Prashanth sivakumar is very hardworking and extremely talented individual. He is good at web development(Front End & Back End) and also has interest in gaming part. He has a lot of deep technical background.

Prasanth is a skilled and hard working individual. He is one of my colleague at University of Kelaniya. I had the pleasure of working with Prasanth in several projects. He is capable of managing any kind of projects and his team members. He motivates people. I would recommend Prasanth as first-rate.

Prasanth was a fantastic person to work with, and is not only a multi-skilled and insightful colleague, but also an inspiring strategist. Very good person. Great employee with a very strong problem solving skills. Prasanth is an asset to any company.

Prasanth Sivakumar is a very intelligent and technical advocate. He has the ability to work as a team, under any pressure and also has a problem solving skills. Would recommend his style and methods of working. He deserves all the credits.
